data.Title: Google Search Experiencing Indexing Issues
data.Description: Reports of a Google Search indexing issue are surfacing, affecting major sites like WSJ, NYT, CNN, and Forbes, with new content not being indexed or served.

data.Title: Google Releases June 2024 Spam Update
data.Description: Heads-up. The June 2024 Spam Update is rolling out. Could take up to a week to roll out. Very interesting. :)

data.Title: Google Search Showing Fewer Reddit and Quora Links
data.Description: Some in the SEO industry have been asking if Google has been showing fewer links in its search results to Reddit over the past several weeks. So Mordy Obserstein pulled some Semrush data that showed a slight downtick in Reddit results in Google's Discussion and Forums section.

data.Title: Sudden Spikes in Googlebot Crawling Could Be a Bad Sign
data.Description: An article from Search Engine Journal reporting that sudden spikes in Googlebot crawling activity on a website could be a sign of hacking or other issues, according to Google's Gary Illyes.

data.Title: Google Testing Defaulting to 6 Results for "People Also Ask"
data.Description: A tweet from @rustybrick noting that Google is testing a default of 6 results instead of 4 for the "People also ask" search feature.

data.Title: Google Adds Menu Button to Some Local Panels in Search
data.Description: A tweet from @rustybrick reporting that Google is adding a menu button to some local panels in search results.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews: FAQs and Impact on Search
data.Description: Analyses reveal that Google's AI Overviews are appearing less frequently. Additionally, Reddit is no longer among the top 10 most cited domains within these overviews.

data.Title: Wikipedia Dominates Google's "People Also Ask" Results
data.Description: Wikipedia dominates the people also ask results in Google Search says data from @JShehata 's @newzdash seroundtable.com/wikipedia-goog…

data.Title: Google Maps Exploit Allows Moving Competitors' Map Pins
data.Description: Google Maps exploit lets you move your competitors map pin far away, resulting in their local rankings drops & even your business being suspended (been an issue for months) seroundtable.com/google-map-pin… covered a lot by @JoyanneHawkins and an awesome recent video from @DarrenShaw_

data.Title: Google AdSense Implements New Privacy Features
data.Description: A tweet from @rustybrick announcing that Google AdSense is rolling out new privacy and messaging features to comply with US state privacy regulations.
